effect.sword_shield: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.

effect.legends_arceus: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.
